ARABIC: قَدْ سَأَلَهَا قَوْمٌ مِّن قَبْلِكُمْ ثُمَّ أَصْبَحُوا۟ بِهَا كَٰفِرِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: People before you asked about them and then later came to reject them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Such things were asked by a people before you, but they disbelieved them afterwards.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Indeed some people before you had asked such questions and in consequence fell into unbelief.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: People living before you had asked about such things, but then rejected them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: A nation before you asked about such matters and then disbelieved in them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Before you, a community asked such questions, then on that account they became disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: A people before you indeed asked such questions, and then became disbelievers on account of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: A people before you questioned concerning them, then disbelieved in them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: A folk before you asked (for such disclosures) and then disbelieved therein.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Other people before you enquired about such things, but when they were disclosed to them, they refused to carry them out.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Surely people have asked questions before you, and were then found disbelievers therein.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly some people asked about them before you and then came to disbelieve in them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Some people before you did ask such questions, and on that account lost their faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Before you, a community asked such questions, then on that account they became disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: A nation asked about them before you, and with it they became unbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: A people before you asked about them, but then came to reject them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: A people asked such [questions] before you; then they became thereby disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [5:102] Verily a people before you asked about them, that is, [they asked] their prophets about such things and they received the response in the form of [revealed] explications of the rules concerning them; and then they disbelieved in them, by neglecting to implement them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (A folk before you asked) their prophets ((for such disclosures) and then disbelieved there in) when things were made clear to them, they disbelieved in them.
